Text.val: -- Convert alpha parameters to current picture
If V.CCRM is totally alphabetic continue with next T203 row or
If V.CCRM is totally numeric continue with next T203 row
If V.CCRM_ALPHA not is alphabetic continue with next T203 row
If V.CCRM_NUM not is numeric continue with next T203 row
-- Continue with next row if all char are Numeric or Alpha
-- Continue with next row if pos. 1 or pos. 2 of pi.CCRM is Numeric
-- Continue with next row if pos 3-end of pi.CCRM is Alpha
